sentences.cn: 仲裁者折衷调解沣了他们的纷争.

sentences.en: Andrew was the arbiter of the disagreement.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁是那场纠纷的仲裁人.

sentences.en: Contains annual reports and examples of the arbiter's work.
sentences.cn: 年度报告和包含的例子仲裁者的工作.

sentences.en: Experiment is the final arbiter in science.
sentences.cn: 实验是科学的最后仲裁者.

sentences.en: He is an arbiter between the contending parties.
sentences.cn: 他是争执各方之间的仲裁者.

sentences.en: He was the ultimate arbiter on both theological and political matters.
sentences.cn: 他在神学和政治事务上都是最终的仲裁人。

sentences.en: I am Keeper of the Law - judge and arbiter.
sentences.cn: 我是法律的维护者 —— 审判官和仲裁官.

sentences.en: She was the final arbiter on all matters of fashion.
sentences.cn: 她是所有流行款式问题的最终决定人.

sentences.en: The arbiter is a junior judge, Denny Chin .
sentences.cn: 仲裁者是初任法官 陈卓光.

sentences.en: The arbiter will have the last say.
sentences.cn: 仲裁员的裁定是终局性的.

sentences.en: The critic was considered to be an arbiter of modern literature.
sentences.cn: 这位批评家被认为是现代文学方面的权威.

sentences.en: The designer has received rave reviews from such arbiters of taste as ‘Elle’ magazine.
sentences.cn: 那名设计师受到《世界时装之苑》杂志等时尚权威的热情赞扬。

sentences.en: The European Court of Justice will be the final arbiter (=  make the final decision  ) in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 欧洲法庭将对这宗争端作出最终裁决。

sentences.en: The law is the final arbiter of what is considered obscene.
sentences.cn: 何谓猥亵最终由法律裁决。

sentences.en: The only arbiter of good taste in wine is you.
sentences.cn: 只有你才是葡萄酒口味好与坏的决定者.

trans.tran_cn: [法]仲裁人，裁决者，权威人士，主宰者
trans.tran_en: someone who influences society’s opinions about what is  stylish  , socially acceptable etc
